channel.title: How i can change pest control prices
channel.description: hello in my pc shop elite void is 0 pts how i can make it higher price

item.title: How i can change pest control prices
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

dragon39990:

Some servers you just change the price of it in “item.cfg”

item.cfg is the place where u can add the bonus of the item
itemassistant.java you can change the price of all the minigame shops.
What i mean with that is when u have a castle wars shop or idk you can give the item’s the amount of points you need to spend

If you wanna change void to 100 points you need to search for case 8839: And you will see something like this return 75; change the 75 to 100

Read full topic
item.source: How i can change pest control prices

item.title: How i can change pest control prices
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

in your shopassistant class search for the id of that item. There should be alot of cases above and below it. Underneath the last case for it, it will say return ##;

change the ## to your price.

EX:

case 8840: case 8839: return 40;

Read full topic
item.source: How i can change pest control prices

item.title: How i can change pest control prices
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

actualy its in shopassistant but add this under the item ids to change the price for example

case 10551: case 10531: case 10533: case 10534: case 10537: return 50;

Read full topic

item.title: How i can change pest control prices
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

src/server/mode/items/itemassistant.java

search its id until u find

case id:
return 0;

change return to the amount of points you want it to cost.

Read full topic
